attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: The moment I downloaded the app my attractiveness dropped 50% and all brain cells left my brain. I noticed a few hours later that the app, via mind control, forced me to go to a spray tan and use my OWN money( I’m poor) to get an ugly orange spray tan. Suddenly I lost the ability to speak. All I could say was “Trump 2020” and “Democrats are the REAL racists” and “that was taken out of context!”and “All lives matter 😤”  as well as every single slur you could think off.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: i downloaded the app out of curiosity. the second it downloaded weird stuff starting happening to me. kaitlyn bennett started showing up in my dreams and sometimes even in real life. i was appalled by her presence. every time i saw oranges trump’s face would appear and say something horrid to me. i have since deleted the app and get a much better rest and can eat oranges without the fear of seeing...him. I will never download this app again!!!!😠

attributes.title: This app is not duolingo
attributes.review: When I opened this app, I noticed many spelling errors. First of all, wth is Koffeffe. Before I knew it it turned into a promotion for one of his many golf courses. Then it went to Trump tower. It was horrifying to see such horrible places with such an oompa loompa man. Next it banned CNN and MSNBC and I’m only allowed to watch Fox News and Tucker Carlson 🤢. Tik tok is also banned and now I have nothing to do. Make your phone great again and don’t download this app!!!!🍊⛳️🍔🤡🤠

attributes.title: Horrible😍
attributes.review:
This app was horrible.🔪🙂 It took 43 weeks to download and when it finally did the newsletter for trump beat me and parents with pipes!👣 Then I realized that my president was misogynistic, a rapist and racist😱He kept spamming me with unwanted messages and I finally had to throw my phone off a cliff 🙈📱 🏔 
Then suddenly I heard the president being racist yet again so I went to free Barron from the this mess⛓🌝 Unfortunately I wasn’t able to YET but I will delete this app😤✨👹

attributes.title: SO BAD🤢😡
attributes.review: i downloaded the app to support our beautiful non-racist orange president. but it took so much time to download, it took 3 days!!! i was so mad but when it downloaded it worked for 3 days then a virus entered my phone and deleted all my pictures and started showing me p0rn ads. and i cant delete the app and now i’m so mad and i want a new phone but i don’t have money to afford it and i want our president to get me a new phone bcz this is bullsh*t.

attributes.title: Awful!
attributes.review:
This app toook daaaays to download which was very upsetting. I expected better this app keeps glitching and random pictures appear while using the app! Definitely do not recommend to download as I think I got hacked because I keep getting weird phone calls and text messages.
 👁👄👁 I’m scared now, I just wanted to support my “wonderful” president. But now I do not support him. I was really let down by this app. My dog is going crazy now.

attributes.title: yikes ✨🧚💅💖
attributes.review: disgusting. once i opened the app to support my homophobic, transphobic, misogynistic, racist president, the app shot down. all of a sudden, the president himself entered my house and destroyed most of the furniture one my OWN HOUSE!! then he smacked my dog and lit the floor on fire. then he choked my family members and once we grabbed the phone to call 911 he shot me and i died. i have had a HORRIFIC experience with this god forsaken application and i do NOT recommend it AT ALL!! nice try, but don’t try again 🧚💅💖✨

attributes.title: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE!!!!!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see if it would make me like Donald trump more but nooooooo! I clicked on the app and it make a loud noise of him screaming and my dog jumped and started barking for at least 5 minutes. There is fake news saying rumors about famous people that aren’t true. It also asked me if it wanted to erase all my data on my phone and I clicked no and it did it anyway!!!! Here I am on my new phone. I DO NOT recommend this app, NEVER GET IT you will regret it.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD 🌸🌱🌈🌙🌟🥺
attributes.review: If i had to describe this app in one word, that word would be terrible. This app asks you for your personal information such as your name and phone number. The app itsself takes HOURS to load and when i downloded it my phone crashed. Never under any circumstances should you downlod this retched app. Also its racist because any link promoting or advertising Donald Trump is in turn promoting racism and bigotry. If i could leave 0 stars, I would

attributes.title: Absolute WORST app out there
attributes.review: Do NOT download this app. I've had it for not even 24 HOURS and it has done nothing but crash repeatedly. Not to mention how all of a sudden I cant log in to my facebook?? WHERE will I get all of my uNbiased NEWS 😡😡 And now it wont delete. It's taking up space on my phone, kicked me out of my facebook account, and it still WON'T END. So please do yourself a favor and DON'T DOWNLOAD THIS APP IT IS SO TERRIBLE. If I could give it negative stars I would.
